members.member: forwards the remote end to another host
listens a connection on the remote end
sends ignorable data: the server may record the message into the log
open a new SSH connection via the .NET socket
the base class for SSH channels

member.name: T:Granados.IO.DataFragment
member.summary: DataFragment represents one or more tuples of (byte[], offset, length). To reduce memory usage, the source byte[] will not be copied. If this behavior is not convenient, call Isolate() method.

members.member: if you allow this request, set 'allowed' to true.
if you allow this request, you must set 'channel' for this request. otherwise, 'channel' is ignored

* if you disallow this request, you can set 'reason_code'. The following reason codes are defined:
#define SSH_OPEN_ADMINISTRATIVELY_PROHIBITED 1 #define SSH_OPEN_CONNECT_FAILED 2 #define SSH_OPEN_UNKNOWN_CHANNEL_TYPE 3 #define SSH_OPEN_RESOURCE_SHORTAGE 4
if you disallow this request, you can set 'reason_message'. this message can contain only ASCII characters.

member.summary: Randomizes the bits in "this" from the default RNG.

member.name: M:Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger.Normalize
member.summary: Normalizes this by setting the length to the actual number of uints used in data and by setting the sign to Sign.Zero if the value of this is 0.

member.name: M:Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger.NextHighestPrime(Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger)
member.returns: The smallest prime >= bi. More mathematically, if bi is prime: bi, else Prime [PrimePi [bi] + 1].

member.name: T:Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger.Kernel
member.summary: Low level functions for the BigInteger

member.name: M:Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger.Kernel.AddSameSign(Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger,Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger)
member.summary: Adds two numbers with the same sign.

member.name: M:Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger.Kernel.SingleByteDivideInPlace(Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Performs n / d and n % d in one operation.
member.param: A BigInteger, upon exit this will hold n / d

member.name: M:Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger.Kernel.Multiply(System.UInt32[],System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32[],System.UInt32,System.UInt32,System.UInt32[],System.UInt32)
member.summary: Multiplies the data in x [xOffset:xOffset+xLen] by y [yOffset:yOffset+yLen] and puts it into d [dOffset:dOffset+xLen+yLen].
member.remarks: This code is unsafe! It is the caller's responsibility to make sure that it is safe to access x [xOffset:xOffset+xLen], y [yOffset:yOffset+yLen], and d [dOffset:dOffset+xLen+yLen].

member.name: M:Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger.Kernel.MultiplyMod2p32pmod(System.UInt32[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.UInt32[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.UInt32[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Multiplies the data in x [xOffset:xOffset+xLen] by y [yOffset:yOffset+yLen] and puts the low mod words into d [dOffset:dOffset+mod].
member.remarks: This code is unsafe! It is the caller's responsibility to make sure that it is safe to access x [xOffset:xOffset+xLen], y [yOffset:yOffset+yLen], and d [dOffset:dOffset+mod].

member.name: F:Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.ConfidenceFactor.ExtraLow
member.summary: Only suitable for development use, probability of failure may be greater than 1/2^20.

member.name: F:Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.ConfidenceFactor.Low
member.summary: Suitable only for transactions which do not require forward secrecy. Probability of failure about 1/2^40

member.name: F:Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.ConfidenceFactor.Medium
member.summary: Designed for production use. Probability of failure about 1/2^80.

member.name: F:Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.ConfidenceFactor.High
member.summary: Suitable for sensitive data. Probability of failure about 1/2^160.

member.name: F:Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.ConfidenceFactor.ExtraHigh
member.summary: Use only if you have lots of time! Probability of failure about 1/2^320.

member.name: F:Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.ConfidenceFactor.Provable
member.summary: Only use methods which generate provable primes. Not yet implemented.

member.name: T:Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.Generator.NextPrimeFinder
member.summary: Finds the next prime after a given number.

member.name: M:Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.Generator.PrimeGeneratorBase.PostTrialDivisionTests(Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger)
member.summary: Performs primality tests on bi, assumes trial division has been done.
member.param: A BigInteger that has been subjected to and passed trial division
member.returns: False if bi is composite, true if it may be prime.
member.remarks: The speed of this method is dependent on Confidence

member.name: M:Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.PrimalityTests.RabinMillerTest(Granados.Mono.Math.BigInteger,Granados.Mono.Math.Prime.ConfidenceFactor)
member.summary: Probabilistic prime test based on Rabin-Miller's test

param.name: confidence
param.para: The number of chosen bases. The test has at least a 1/4^confidence chance of falsely returning True.

returns.para: True if "this" is a strong pseudoprime to randomly chosen bases.
False if "this" is definitely NOT prime.

member.name: T:Granados.Poderosa.SFTP.SFTPClient

remarks.para: This class is designed to be used in the worker thread.
Some methods block thread while waiting for the response.

member.remarks:
Referenced specification:
IETF Network Working Group Internet Draft
SSH File Transfer Protocol
draft-ietf-secsh-filexfer-02 (protocol version 3)

member.name: F:Granados.Poderosa.SFTP.SFTPStatusCode.SSH_FX_OK
member.summary: Indicates successful completion of the operation.

member.name: F:Granados.Poderosa.SFTP.SFTPStatusCode.SSH_FX_NO_SUCH_FILE
member.summary: returned when a reference is made to a file which should exist but doesn't.

member.name: F:Granados.Poderosa.SFTP.SFTPStatusCode.SSH_FX_PERMISSION_DENIED
member.summary: returned when the authenticated user does not have sufficient permissions to perform the operation.

member.name: F:Granados.Poderosa.SFTP.SFTPStatusCode.SSH_FX_BAD_MESSAGE
member.summary: may be returned if a badly formatted packet or protocol incompatibility is detected.

member.name: F:Granados.Poderosa.SFTP.SFTPStatusCode.SSH_FX_NO_CONNECTION
member.summary: a pseudo-error which indicates that the client has no connection to the server (it can only be generated locally by the client, and MUST NOT be returned by servers).

member.name: F:Granados.Poderosa.SFTP.SFTPStatusCode.SSH_FX_CONNECTION_LOST
member.summary: a pseudo-error which indicates that the connection to the server has been lost (it can only be generated locally by the client, and MUST NOT be returned by servers).

member.name: F:Granados.Poderosa.SFTP.SFTPStatusCode.SSH_FX_OP_UNSUPPORTED
member.summary: indicates that an attempt was made to perform an operation which is not supported for the server (it may be generated locally by the client if e.g. the version number exchange indicates that a required feature is not supported by the server, or it may be returned by the server if the server does not implement an operation).

member.name: M:Granados.Poderosa.SFTP.SFTPStatusCode.ToString(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the text representing a specified status code.
